original: <color=#bceea7>$city1</color>等<color=#bceea7>$num1</color>個據點，疫癘橫行，民吏多身染惡疾，死者眾多，據點人口驟減！
text: <color=#bceea7>$city1</color> and other <color=#bceea7>$num1</color> strongholds, epidemics are rampant, many civilians are infected with diseases, many dead, and the population of the strongholds has plummeted!
